mutants.original_line: """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings,
mutants.code:
def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """"""
    lst = lst[::-1]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = ''.join(lst)
    return result

def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings, 
    and concatenates them into a single string without any separators."""
    lst = lst[::+1]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = ''.join(lst)
    return result

def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings, 
    and concatenates them into a single string without any separators."""
    lst = lst[::-1]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = 'MUTATED'.join(lst)
    return result

def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings, 
    and concatenates them into a single string without any separators."""
    lst = lst[::-2]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = ''.join(lst)
    return result

def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings, 
    and concatenates them into a single string without any separators."""
    lst = lst[::-0]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = ''.join(lst)
    return result

def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings, 
    and concatenates them into a single string without any separators."""
    lst = lst[::-0]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = ''.join(lst)
    return result

def amalgamate_integers(lst):
    """Takes a list of integers, reverses their order, converts them to strings, 
    and concatenates them into a single string without any separators."""
    lst = lst[::--1]
    lst = [str(i) for i in lst]
    result = ''.join(lst)
    return result
